name: reportingwithai-agent-nodejs
description: Node.js/TypeScript Lambda for chart generation with Claude Agent SDK

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/index.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:aws-sdk --external:@anthropic-ai/claude-agent-sdk --external:@modelcontextprotocol/sdk && esbuild src/manual_run.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/manual_run.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:aws-sdk --external:@anthropic-ai/claude-agent-sdk --external:@modelcontextprotocol/sdk && cp src/agent/system-prompt.md dist/system-prompt.md
